name: Investment & ROI Analysis
description: Evaluate potential investments, initiatives, or projects using financial analysis including NPV, IRR, payback period, and sensitivity analysis. Build business cases that support capital allocation decisions.

painPoints: Internal historical data not well organized

currentProcess.description: Build financial model with cash flows
painPoints: Timing of cash flows is uncertain

aiProcess.description: Structure investment scope and success criteria
aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude helps structure the investment thesis and identify information gaps
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Investment framework with clear scope and success metrics
tips: Document assumptions explicitly
Define what success looks like in measurable terms

aiProcess.toolRationale: Perplexity finds relevant benchmarks and industry data
tips: Search for '[investment type] ROI benchmark' and '[industry] payback period'
Include both successes and failures

aiProcess.description: Generate cash flow assumptions and model structure
aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude can reason about cash flow drivers and timing
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Structured cash flow assumptions with rationale
tips: Be explicit about benefit timing assumptions
Include ramp-up period if applicable

aiProcess.description: Build model and calculate metrics (manual + AI)
aiProcess.toolRationale: Manual Excel work; AI validates calculations and explains results
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Completed financial model with NPV, IRR, payback
tips: Have AI verify your discount rate choice
Ask AI to explain what the IRR means in plain English

aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude identifies key sensitivities and reasonable ranges
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Sensitivity table showing impact of key variables
tips: Focus on 3-4 most uncertain variables
Ask for 'break-even' analysis on each variable

aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude can systematically identify risks across categories
tips: Include execution risks, not just financial risks
Ask for risk-adjusted scenarios

aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT writes clear, persuasive business cases
tips: Lead with the recommendation
Include 'reasons to believe' and 'key risks'

aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude can anticipate tough stakeholder questions
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Q&A prep document with suggested answers
tips: Think about CFO-style skeptical questions
Prepare for 'what if you're wrong?' questions

whyItMatters: Capital allocation is one of the most important decisions a company makes. Good investment analysis ensures resources flow to highest-return opportunities. At AAA, proper ROI analysis on the AI pilot program demonstrated 10% IRR, securing funding and executive support.
commonMistakes: Over-optimistic benefit estimates - always triangulate with benchmarks
Using wrong discount rate - should reflect risk of the specific investment
Not testing sensitivity to key assumptions
Presenting analysis without a clear recommendation
tips: Use AI to sanity-check your assumptions against industry benchmarks
Ask AI to play 'devil's advocate' on your business case
Build a template model you can reuse - speeds up future analyses
Document your assumptions explicitly - you'll thank yourself later
Always calculate payback period - executives love this metric
sources: Aditya Goyal AAA Experience - IRR calculations, AI pilot program 10% IRR
Perplexity Research - Investment analysis best practices
